text: Fast, tasty pizza and a generous rewards program. Plenty of socially distanced outdoor seating, nicely separated from the parking lot.

name: Sun Park
text: I had the BEST pizza yesterday. I have been a frequent customer in many Blaze pizza places- at Farmer's Market, at La Canada Flintridge etc. Freddy made an AMAZING pizza for us last night. If you want an awesome pizza, ask FREDDY to do it for you. All the staffs were nice as well. Thank you Freddy!

name: Josue Benavidez
text: Great place for a quick lunch. They have a half pizza lunch special which is perfect. Bring your own straw though.

name: avi shindel
text: Best made to order pizza. They have vegan spicy chorizo and roasted squash among their non-meat options.

name: vachon simien
text: Love blaze.  The vegetarian cheese here is great.  I walkways get the build your own and pile on the meats.  The don't skimp or balk when you ask for "a little bit more." the only downside of the place is the layout.  It's hard to find the line and indoor seating is limited.

name: ElizabethRiki Suzuki
text: Always good service. During this visit there was a fundraiser happening and the line was really long. Despite this, the line moved fast.

text: Gluten free dough and vegan cheese with all the toppings you could want. Plus, it's delicious!

name: Cathryn Stokes
text: I get their 5.00 deal and i build it myself. Can't beat that ! Did i say it comes with a salad or garlic bead knots? I choose there butternut and fruit salad. Empire Center Burbank.

name: Brittany Allen
text: I'm originally from Maryland, where they only have 1 in Baltimore City. I've got to say this was my favorite pizza I've ever had. I love getting to make my pizza the way I like it, but I've still had pizzas with bad quality ingredients. This place has fresh ingredients and good prices. Best pizza I've ever had!

text: Another build your own pizza place. This location provided good service and delicious pizzas.

text: It was mediocre pizza, not bad but not very filling. Had some good fountain drinks I guess.
